articles.title: U.N. chief warns of 'catastrophic conflagration' in Sudan as foreign exodus accelerates - Reuters.com
articles.description: Western, Arab and Asian nations raced to extract their citizens from Sudan on Monday as the U.N. chief warned of the risk of "a catastrophic conflagration" with wider repercussions…
articles.content: KHARTOUM, April 24 (Reuters) - Western, Arab and Asian nations raced to extract their citizens from Sudan on Monday as the U.N. chief warned of the risk of "a catastrophic conflagration" with wider r… [+6745 chars]
